        Parameters:
        context - The Context of the Activity or the Fragment.
        permissions - The Permission you are need.
        response - Result callback.

        permissions - The Permissions you are need.
        response - Result callback.

      • hasAllPermission

        public static boolean hasAllPermission(@NonNull
                                       android.content.Context context,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions)
        Check if the user has granted the permissions.
        Parameters:
        context - a Android context
        permissions - The Permission you are need to check.
        Returns:
        true if all permissions are granted or false if any permission is missing

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public static void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                              java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                              @NonNull
                                              int[] grantResults)
        Must bee called by Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The automatically generated request code
        permissions - The requested permissions
        grantResults - The result codes of the request
        See Also:
